fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Natural: When you are at max HP, your hand size is 6.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Healing: Play a Reforged Heal! on someone. [4 uses, 2 CD, Unlocks D2]
- Cleansing: Play a Reforged Cleanse! on someone. [2 uses, 2 CD, Unlocks D2]
- Revitalize: Choose a player that is not yourself. If they win with you (Uncertain), save them on 1 HP if they die from non-event causes in this phase with all status effects still applied. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2, Locks D5]
